DescriptionData.Title: Formal Hobo Clown Costumes
DescriptionData.Description: For the clown who likes to perform in formal attire, this is good start for a hobo clown costume. The pants, shirt, vest, belly stuffer, and cravat with a stick pin comes in one piece. The black coat is a separate piece but comes with this fancy dress clown costume. These Halloween-quality clown costumes are great for casual use or beginner clowns. Wig, shoes and gloves not included. One size fits most adults.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Wig, shoes and gloves not included
Coat is a separate piece but is included in the costume
